Herborn has a good connection to highway A45, the connection between
. Two junctions lead from the A45 into the city. Federal route B255 from
(Westerwald) leads to Herborn, also the route B277 connecting
The main sights of Herborn are:

value: Historic townscape with many beautiful half-timbered houses
The romantic market place in the heart of the city
The middle-ages reformed academy Hohe Schule ("high school"), today seat of the city museum
The castle (still inhabited by a seminary of the protestant church of Hesse)
The more than 1,000 year old (Protestant) city church and the remainders of the city walls with many towers.
Nearby, the bird-park of Herborn-Uckersdorf has more than 100 types of local and exotic birds and many other animals, a garden-café, playground, and other interesting features
Take a walk through the historic city on your own, or get a guided city sightseeing tour (available at any desired day/time, also in English language)
Visit the bird-park nearby in the district "Uckersdorf", 5 km from the city centre

Herborn is also popular for hiking - there are qualified hiking trails starting (or ending) in Herborn, like the "Westerwaldsteig" and the "Lahn-Dill-Berglandpfad", very attractive hiking routes, leading through the beautiful landscape with many forests and exciting views!

Local specialities are "Schlumpeweck" and "Fastebrezel" in a few baceries and/or cafés. Also, Herborn is famous for its meats.

For more than 100 years, the brewery "Herborner Bärenbräu" has brewed beer in Herborn. Today you can enjoy a house-brewed beer in the guesthouse-brewery "Gutshof" with beer-garden, small playground, hotel.
There are many hotels, guest houses and holiday flats available in Herborn. For any question, please contact the tourist information office in the town hall, telephone (Germany) 2772 7081900.
